items.title: ‘Vietnam Puts AI at the Center of Its Economic Strategy,’ Deputy Director of the Vietnam National Innovation Center Says at NVIDIA AI Day Ho Chi Minh City
items.raw_excerpt: On Tuesday, more than 800 attendees joined NVIDIA AI Day Ho Chi Minh City to learn about sovereign AI — including 15 breakout sections on physical, agentic and generative AI, as well as AI factories that are enabling innovation at the regional, national and global scales.

title_i18n.en: ‘Vietnam Puts AI at the Center of Its Economic Strategy,’ Deputy Director of the Vietnam National Innovation Center Says at NVIDIA AI Day Ho Chi Minh City
title_i18n.zh: 越南国家创新中心副主任在胡志明市NVIDIA人工智能日活动上表示，越南将人工智能置于经济发展战略的核心位置。
title_i18n.es: Vietnam sitúa la inteligencia artificial en el centro de su estrategia económica, afirma el subdirector del Centro Nacional de Innovación de Vietnam en la Jornada de Inteligencia Artificial de NVIDIA en Ciudad Ho Chi Minh.

excerpt_i18n.en: On Tuesday, more than 800 attendees joined NVIDIA AI Day Ho Chi Minh City to learn about sovereign AI — including 15 breakout sections on physical, agentic and generative AI, as well as AI factories that are enabling innovation at the regional, national and global scales.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 周二，逾800名参与者齐聚胡志明市英伟达人工智能日活动，共同探讨主权人工智能议题。活动涵盖15个专题研讨环节，涉及物理人工智能、代理人工智能与生成式人工智能，以及赋能创新的AI工厂建设。
excerpt_i18n.es: El martes, más de 800 asistentes se unieron a NVIDIA AI Day en Ciudad Ho Chi Minh para aprender sobre la inteligencia artificial soberana, incluyendo 15 sesiones paralelas sobre IA física, agentiva y generativa, así como fábricas de IA que están permitiendo inn

items.title: How PropHero built an intelligent property investment advisor with continuous evaluation using Amazon Bedrock
items.raw_excerpt: In this post, we explore how we built a multi-agent conversational AI system using Amazon Bedrock that delivers knowledge-grounded property investment advice. We explore the agent architecture, model selection strategy, and comprehensive continuous evaluation system that facilitates quality conversations while facilitating rapid iteration and improvement.

title_i18n.en: How PropHero built an intelligent property investment advisor with continuous evaluation using Amazon Bedrock
title_i18n.zh: PropHero如何利用Amazon Bedrock构建具备持续评估功能的智能房产投资顾问
title_i18n.es: Cómo PropHero construyó un asesor inteligente de inversión inmobiliaria con evaluación continua usando Amazon Bedrock

excerpt_i18n.en: In this post, we explore how we built a multi-agent conversational AI system using Amazon Bedrock that delivers knowledge-grounded property investment advice. We explore the agent architecture, model selection strategy, and comprehensive continuous evaluation system that facilitates quality conversations while facilitating rapid iteration and improvement.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 本文探讨如何利用亚马逊Bedrock构建多智能体对话AI系统，提供基于知识的房产投资建议。我们将解析智能体架构与模型选择策略，
excerpt_i18n.es: En esta publicación, exploramos cómo construimos un sistema de IA conversacional multiagente usando Amazon Bedrock que ofrece asesoramiento de inversión inmobiliaria basado en conocimiento. Analizamos la arquitectura de agentes, la estrategia de selección de modelos,

items.title: Accelerate benefits claims processing with Amazon Bedrock Data Automation
items.raw_excerpt: In the benefits administration industry, claims processing is a vital operational pillar that makes sure employees and beneficiaries receive timely benefits, such as health, dental, or disability payments, while controlling costs and adhering to regulations like HIPAA and ERISA. In this post, we examine the typical benefit claims processing workflow and identify where generative AI-powered automation can deliver the greatest impact.

title_i18n.en: Accelerate benefits claims processing with Amazon Bedrock Data Automation
title_i18n.zh: 利用亚马逊Bedrock数据自动化加速福利理赔处理
title_i18n.es: Acelera el procesamiento de solicitudes de prestaciones con la Automatización de Datos de Amazon Bedrock

excerpt_i18n.en: In the benefits administration industry, claims processing is a vital operational pillar that makes sure employees and beneficiaries receive timely benefits, such as health, dental, or disability payments, while controlling costs and adhering to regulations like HIPAA and ERISA. In this post, we examine the typical benefit claims processing workflow and identify where generative AI-powered automation can deliver the greatest impact.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 在福利管理行业中，理赔处理是确保员工和受益人及时获得健康、牙科或伤残补助等福利的关键运营支柱，同时控制成本。
excerpt_i18n.es: En la industria de la administración de beneficios, el procesamiento de reclamaciones es un pilar operativo vital que garantiza que los empleados y beneficiarios reciban prestaciones oportunas, como pagos de salud, dentales o por discapacidad, mientras se controlan

items.title: Gemini now explains why your Sheets formula failed
items.raw_excerpt: Nine months after Google infused Gemini AI into Google Sheets, the AI system graduated from text and charts to taking on formulas. (Even those plopped into messy wedding planning spreadsheets, I found.)  Gemini’s chatbot appears on the right-hand side of Sheets. Now, when you ask how to manipulate data, Gemini will respond with suggested formulas […]

title_i18n.en: Gemini now explains why your Sheets formula failed
title_i18n.zh: Gemini现可解释您的表格公式出错原因
title_i18n.es: Gemini ahora explica por qué falló tu fórmula de Hojas de cálculo

excerpt_i18n.en: Nine months after Google infused Gemini AI into Google Sheets, the AI system graduated from text and charts to taking on formulas. (Even those plopped into messy wedding planning spreadsheets, I found.)  Gemini’s chatbot appears on the right-hand side of Sheets. Now, when you ask how to manipulate data, Gemini will respond with suggested formulas […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 谷歌将Gemini AI整合进表格应用九个月后，该AI系统已从处理文本和图表升级到能解析公式（我发现在杂乱婚礼策划表格中输入的公式也能处理）。Gemini的
excerpt_i18n.es: Nueve meses después de que Google incorporara la IA Gemini en Google Sheets, el sistema de inteligencia artificial pasó de manejar texto y gráficos a encargarse de fórmulas. (Incluso aquellas insertadas en desordenadas hojas de cálculo para planificar bodas, descubrí). La capacidad de Gemini

items.title: What happens when an AI-generated artist gets a record deal? A copyright mess
items.raw_excerpt: Two weeks ago, record company Hallwood Media signed a deal with Telisha "Nikki" Jones after negotiations that purportedly included an offer of $3 million, Billboard reported. Jones is a Mississippi-based lyricist behind the R&B artist "Xania Monet" whose most popular song on Spotify racked up over 1 million listens, and whose Reels regularly top 100,000 […]

title_i18n.en: What happens when an AI-generated artist gets a record deal? A copyright mess
title_i18n.zh: AI生成歌手获唱片合约时会发生什么？一场版权混战
title_i18n.es: ¿Qué sucede cuando un artista generado por inteligencia artificial consigue un contrato discográfico? Un lío de derechos de autor

excerpt_i18n.en: Two weeks ago, record company Hallwood Media signed a deal with Telisha "Nikki" Jones after negotiations that purportedly included an offer of $3 million, Billboard reported. Jones is a Mississippi-based lyricist behind the R&B artist "Xania Monet" whose most popular song on Spotify racked up over 1 million listens, and whose Reels regularly top 100,000 […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 据《公告牌》报道，两周前唱片公司Hallwood Media与密西西比籍作词人Telisha "Nikki" Jones达成签约，据称谈判中包含300万美元的报价。
excerpt_i18n.es: Hace dos semanas, la discográfica Hallwood Media firmó un acuerdo con Telisha "Nikki" Jones tras unas negociaciones que al parecer incluyeron una oferta de 3 millones de dólares, informó Billboard. Jones es una letrista afincada en Misisipi responsable de
